column4: if i install ubuntio after a copy of winXP, can i access files/data that has been input into the hdd already on xp? ie music, video, spreadsheets. or do i ned to copy everything and put it on the hdd a second time after ubuntu is installed?
if your dual booting you can just mount the windows partitions
- but while  im on the ubuntu os i cant get to those files?
yes you can.  You have to mount the specific partition the files are located on
